Package gabrielLopes.project2425.DevPackage.QuickFixApp.navBar

Class NavBarHandler

java.lang.Object
gabrielLopes.project2425.DevPackage.QuickFixApp.navBar.NavBarHandler
public class NavBarHandler extends Object
Utility class for handling bottom navigation bar behavior across activities.

Manages navigation actions, selected tab highlighting, and sizing adjustments.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public static void setup(android.app.Activity activity, int userId)
      Initializes navigation bar item click listeners to switch between app sections.
      Parameters:
      activity - The current activity context used to bind and start activities.
      userId - The ID of the logged-in user to pass with navigation intents.

    • highlightSelected

      public static void highlightSelected(android.app.Activity activity, int selectedNavId)
      Highlights the selected navigation item by resizing its icon and toggling label visibility.
      Parameters:
      activity - The current activity that hosts the navigation bar.
      selectedNavId - The resource ID of the selected navigation item.

    • dpToPx

      private static int dpToPx(android.content.Context context, int dp)
      Converts a value in density-independent pixels (dp) to pixels (px). for consistent sizing across different screen densities.
      Parameters:
      context - The context used to access display metrics.
      dp - The value in dp to convert.
      Returns:
      The corresponding value in pixels.
